definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Jericho (on form see Baer on Jos 2:1, Je 39:5 Kö:Einl. 49; √ and mng. dub.; acc. to Thes al. from [[רָוַח]], = regio fragrans, the district abounding in palms, rose-gardens, balsam, etc.);—[[יְרִיחוֹ]] Jos 2:1 + 27 t. Jos. (19 t. JE, 3 t. D, 6 t. P), + 5 t. 2Ki 2; [[יְרִחוֹ]] Jos 18:21, 2Sa 10:5, Je 39:5, Je 52:8; [[יְרִחׂה]] 1Ki 16:34; [[יְרֵחוֹ]] De 34:1 (P), v:De 34:3 (D), Nu 22:1 (P) + 9 t. P, 2Ki 25:5, Ezr 2:34, Ne 3:2, Ne 7:36 + 3 t. Ch;—Canaanit. city taken by Josh. Jos 6:1 (JE) +; having a king Jos 2:2, Jos 2:3, Jos 8:2, Jos 10:1 (all JE), Jos 10:28, Jos 10:30, Jos 12:9 (all D); near Jordan, whence ([[יְרִיחוֹ]]) [[יַרְדֵּן יְרֵחוֹ]], v. [[יַרְדֵּן]] supr.; Mt. Nebo is described as [[עַל־פְּנֵי יְרֵחוֹ]] De 32:49, De 34:1 (P); (called [[עִיר הַתְּמָרִים]] Dt 1:16, De 3:13; so in appos. De 34:3, 2Ch 28:15); the adjacent plain is called [[בִּקְעַת יְרֵחוֹ]] De 34:3 (JE); [[עַרְבוֹת יְרֵחוֹ]] 2Ki 25:5 = Je 39:5 = Je 52:8; [[יְרִיחוֹ]] ´[[ע]] Jos 4:13, Jos 5:10 (both P); among returning exiles appear [[בְּנֵי יְרֵחוֹ]] Ezr 2:34 = Ne 7:36, and among builders of wall [[אַנְשֵׁי יְרֵחוֹ]] Ne 3:2 (Be Ry Ryle ad loc. and Ezr 2:34);—mod. (E)rî ḥâ; see also GASm:Geogr. 266 ff.
